name: Go Doggo Go
description:
Created for the Wholesome Games Jam, October 2020!

Your owner works from home soooo much lately, and frankly, it's getting old.  It's time to take matters into your own paws, break down that baby gate, and GET INTO THE KITCHEN FOR THOSE TREATS!

Your wily human is on to you, though, and will catch you in the act.  Use your tricks (barking, pooping, ruining toys, or distracting your human) to get them out of the way and destroy that gate!

CONTROLS

WASD to move

LMB to interact with items / UI

CREDITS: Team Teemie
Ashley Rivas: Game design, programming
Celine Torrella: 2D Art
Daniel Rivas: Voice over / SFX
Soundtrack:
Background Music Downloads - No Copyright on YouTube
